sentences.en: Alice ran round the thistle again.
sentences.cn: 阿丽思又绕着那棵蓟跑.

sentences.en: And away they all flew like the down a thistle.

sentences.en: Bees moved , humming thoughtfully , from scarlet poppy to purple thistle.

sentences.en: Dioscorides wrote that Milk Thistle seeds could be to treat snake bites.
sentences.cn: 迪奥斯科里季斯曾写到,水飞蓟的种子可以用来对付蛇的咬伤.

sentences.en: Eurasian thistle growing in sand dunes and dry chalky soils.
sentences.cn: 在沙丘或干旱白垩土壤中生长的欧亚蓟.

sentences.en: For some reason every species is blue - violet: lupine, blue - eyed grass, thistle, gentian.
sentences.cn: 不知什么原因,所有的物种都是紫蓝色的: 羽扇豆, 蓝眼草, 蒲公英, 龙胆草.

sentences.en: Goldfinches like thistle seeds, hulled sunflower seeds, and oil-type sunflower seeds.

sentences.en: She sifted thistles through her thistle - sifter.

sentences.en: The 10-piece set features a raised and gilded oak leaf border with acorns and the national symbols of the daffodil, rose and thistle on a pale blue base.
sentences.cn: 这个陶瓷10件套的边缘用向上攀升的镀金橡树叶和橡树果作装饰，中间是国家的标志：水仙花，玫瑰和淡蓝色基底上的蓟。

sentences.en: The lace design incorporated rose, thistle, daffodil and shamrock — the emblems of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 蕾丝图案上有玫瑰、蓟、水仙花和三叶草（英格兰、苏格兰、威尔士和北爱尔兰的象征）。

sentences.en: The thistle is the emblem of Scotland.
The wild thistle has a very high nutritional value.
sentences.cn: 野生的刺儿菜营养价值很高.
